text: However a separate revealed that Mr Diefenbaker was still ahead in terms of popularity as an individual leader (for Mr. Diefenbaker 36 per cent, for Mr. Pearson 34 per cent) - How far is Mr. Lester Pearson acceptable to the people of Canada as a Prime Minister? Many observers at the national rally will be seeking an answer.
